Package test

Class AthleteItemTest

java.lang.Object
test.AthleteItemTest
public class AthleteItemTest extends Object
JUnit Test for Athlete class and Item class,, but it will cover Market class and Team class partially.
Author:
J Kim

  • Method Details

    • getRadomAthlete

      @BeforeEach void getRadomAthlete()
      get one random athlete from market and check if the description of athlete is printing correctly

    • getRandomitem

      @BeforeEach void getRandomitem()
      get one random item from market and check if the description of item is printing correctly

    • testSellPrice

      @RepeatedTest(300) void testSellPrice()
      check the sell price of athlete For accuracy, repeat 300 times

    • testInjuredStatus

      @AfterEach void testInjuredStatus()
      test athletes injured status by increasing and decreasing stamina value and also test maximum stamina function

    • testNotInjuredStatus

      @AfterEach void testNotInjuredStatus()
      testing athlete's amount of stamina by reducing and increasing. it shouldn't increase over maximum amount.

    • testSetOffenseStat

      @AfterEach void testSetOffenseStat()
      testing athlete's offense stat by increasing certain amount.

    • testSetDefenseStat

      @AfterEach void testSetDefenseStat()
      testing athlete's Defense stat by increasing certain amount.

    • testTradingUsingItem

      @AfterEach void testTradingUsingItem()
      testing fuction to buy/sell athlete and item and check whether they are in player's roster and inventory or not.
